Reason: The 'commitlog_segment_size_in_mb' configuration is performance-sensitive. This is because the size of individual commitlog file segments directly impacts how much data can be written to each segment before it is archived, deleted, or recycled. The code uses this configuration value when creating new segments, allocating buffers, and calculating the on-disk size of the commit log segments. Changes in the segment size can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, affecting the efficiency of segment creations, data flushing, and overall system performance.
